name: OLDFASIONED
author: david
description: XLM macro to download files and/or execute commands

stages._action_comments: This only works on 32-bit installations of Excel
This stage spawns a new process with arguments. Works on x64 and x86
This stage injects threads into a process. Currently only works on x86, currently can only create local threads

action_params._exec_method_comment: EXEC (builtin to XLM), CreateProcess (from kernel32.dll), ShellExecute (from shell32.dll)
